content.detailedDescription: While coming back from lunch to fry's, i was on the flyover ramp (facing north) and noticed a large rectangular shape off to the left of of the mandalay bay towers. it grabbed my attention and i almost drove into the wall of the flyover. my first thought was that it was a balloon, but that didn't fit. instead of heading back to work, i took a right into the parking lots and tried to keep the ufo in sight. it was moving north along what seemed to be the general path of the i-15 corridor. when i first saw it, it was at least twice as large as the letters on the top of the mandalay bay casino from my perspective. the object was dark, but you could tell that the haze of the atmosphere that it was not near by. because of the haze, i would say it was a dark grey in color. the edges seemed defined. at one point it turned on edge and i thought i lost track of it. so it must have been thin when looking "edge on". nothing about it's various orientations during its flight told me that it could not have been a square shape. total time of view was about ten minutes and i figure that it traveled north along the i-15 corridor in that time so it must have been flying at over 100 mph. last glimpse of it was still heading north. it had to have flown right by the mccarran airport and nellis afb control centers. i cannot emphasize enough the square shape and the the relative thinness of the object. also, it flew with it's body at an angle that was not aerodynamic to its direction of movement except for that short time that i thought i lost sight of it. i finally lost sight of it trying to look down las vegas blvd as it appeared to be heading to the peaks of the mountains of the north las vegas valley, ironically and generally in the direction of area 51. i was the assistant state director for colorado mufon for eight years and consider myself to be a trained observer.

My relative was on the front deck of the cottage talking on the cellphone and yelled to me and my wife to get out side to see this orange light streaking overhead. it came from the south going north west. it was moving fast and flickering. it only lasted about 7-8 seconds and faded out.

we waited about a minute and started back in when another one appeared just as bright going on the same path as the first one that appeared and faded away. both went in the same perfectly straight path.

both times there was no sound. nobody was out on the street and there are no street lamps on our street.  

we new right away that it was not a plane as they don't have orange lights and there was no sound and we are not near an airplane approach or flight path.
content.summary: Bright orange spheres came from south to north west for a short distance

content.detailedDescription:
At around 2 pm on a cloudless sunny afternoon in a parking lot we saw clearly a cylinder moving forward and stopping, reversing backwards, then flying for
forward and disappearing.  it was clearly metallic, without wings or tail.
we have never seen a ufo before.  we were amazed.
content.summary: Metallic cylander.  no wings or tail

content.detailedDescription: I was talking to 2 work mates after coming back from sydney,after sightings being reported over radio station over central coast that ufo,s were sighted,me sceptic having seen object s in my past, my self put it down to aircraft.Well as i turned from talking to work mates to drive home behind my car as dusk set the siloweted trees in the back ground sudenly 6 bright round objects one larger than five others ,the largest sat in middle other 5 sat even distance around it they suddenly apeared  headed toward tree line then done a perfect u turn with fenominal speed & acuracy as such they left traveling light behind them,but with no engine noise at all ,when i turned back to work mates and said did you see that they said what ,i went home and kept this to my self but i know what i seen with my eyes,it was truley awsome to see.
content.summary: 6 bright lights extrem speed & acuracy

content.detailedDescription: This is the story as it was told to me by my daughter and her boyfriend and i can collaborate it as i was able to witness and hear the ufo as it sped away. my daughter and her boyfriend had entered our neighborhood  which is densely populated with live oak trees around 1:00am and noticed there was a stationary object with 2 lights hovering about 25ft. above the treeline at their ten o'clock ne about 3 blocks away. her boyfriend noticed that the top part of the object seemed translucent and it seemed as though he could see through it and bottom part was more opaque and solid. they turned left on the next street towards our house and my daughter kept the object in sight the entire time. then they turned right onto the circle where we live. it is a keyhole circle surrounded by trees and we live at the end of it. they then parked the car and got out so they could get a better look. the craft at this time was about a block away and at their one o'clock se still hovering above the treeline. at this point i got a phone call from my daughter telling me to come out immediately as there was a ufo. i ran out of the house and could hear a whirring noise above my head. i looked up and could see an object speeding ahead of me with lights blinking than disappearing behind the sw tree line in the distance. my daughter's boyfriend looked up as the craft passed directly over his head. he said that after they parked the car and got out. the object moved to the eight o'clock position then made a right angle turn then passed directly over our house and over their heads speeding out of sight behind the trees. my daughter's boyfriend's description of the under belly of the craft was as follows; he said it was as big as a house and was about 50ft to 75ft from the ground. it was triangular with rounded corners, like a billiard ball rack. it had 2 round white lights, one at each end of the bottom of the triangle and 1 amber light at the top, was gunmetal in color and had an inverted rectangular tray shape inset within the triangle which had parallel lines. he also noticed the whirring noise as it passed over, but it didn't seem to be an engine noise but more like a wind noise passing over something. my husband also heard the whirring noise and felt the vibrations as it passed over the house. nobody heard the noise until it was moving directly overhead. my daughter was not able to get a picture because she was busy calling me and her boyfriends phone died just as he tried to take a picture. this is the second time they have seen a triangular craft in our neighborhood. the first time was around the same time about 6 months ago, a few blocks further away and higher up. it also sped away in a southwesterly direction.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: spotted triangle ufo hovering over tree line in our neighborhood

content.detailedDescription: I was walking south looking up watching the barn swallows flying for their dinner.I was at volunteer park. past the birds i thought i saw a bald eagle flying. i love to watch them and so i did. i thought i saw the white of the tail. the movement was strange for a bird , they usually fly up high on updrafts ,circling. this did not circle. it rotated,and sped up and slowed down. it looked like it became two, so i thought oh that's why it weird there are two. i sat and watched, and as it flew i knew that it was no bird, so i started to think it was a mylar balloon. as it rotated tail over end, it would go black , bright flash, then sometimes red , and then disappear.This was a constant the changing of color. sometimes black to disappear, or black to red to a flash, then it would disappear.It was going in the direction of the wind,but it was moving faster than the clouds. i watched until i could barley see it. and at that point it would go black to a quick flash to clear. it became consistent, perhaps due to the distance.I was like wow that was cool. i felt giddy. i looked around and no one was looking. this lasted for about two to three minutes. it also appeared to have some sort of emissions, but i was not so sure because it was against cloud cover.
content.summary: Oblong, rotating, rotating color

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my balcony looking up at the sky straight up above my head i saw a star formation alphekka, and then it looked like a star broke free. i first thought it was just a blur, or a plane, but then it flew in a pattern unfamiliar to planes, it was erratic in nature, it paused, and then continue to move north through hercules, toward vega and disappeared. it didn't gain intensity, it stayed a faint brightness, but  remained visible for almost 2 minutes, and then it disappeared. i felt like this was my first actual sighting, that i wanted to share with a community. after it took me an hour to gather my thoughts, and decide that i had to tell someone about it. i went back out to look and i didn't see anything like what i saw before.
content.summary: Small star-like object moving at a moderate rate of speed high in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was asleep in my bed at our apartment complex. my boyfriend at the time was also asleep. i thought i was dreaming, there were shadows and blobs that looked out of focus like you were looking through a viewfinder. it felt like i was lifted from my bed and could make sounds but could not move. the next thing i remember was waking up to the sound of my six year old son screaming. when i made it to his room he was terrified that some bugs were in his room. he has never done that before and to this day is terrified of "bugs". he would not go back to sleep that night. the next day, i was combing my hair behind my ears my left ear was very sore, a friend of mine looked behind my ear and i have a huge scar on it. the scar was not there before and hurts. it felt very hot and the scar is still there. there feels like there is a knot in it that will not go away.

we have also on a couple of nights witnessed low flying star like objects flying in all directions. they are definetly not airplanes or helicoptors. they fly very low and make no sound .

i hope i am just overreacting and there is nothing to any of this. my current boyfriend has urged me to contact your organization. i don't really
subscribe to any of this. i don't know what to think.

 i have photos of my scar, and every time we see these things flying in the sky i try to take a picture and our camera will not work.
content.summary: Several very low flying stars moving very slow to very fast in all directions

content.detailedDescription:
Laying in bed, hot as can be, because the family wanted to save money and sleep with the windows open.  i couldn't fall back asleep because it was very humid that night.  i heard a noise, not too loud, not too faint.  the noise sounded sort of like a a/c compressor pulsing and humming.

well been a hvac technician for 2 years working with compressors daily, this was no freon compressor i have ever heard.  the noise was very distinct and i could tell what it was.  the noise was a electrical humming with pulses in a out.  i could tell it was above me, and not below me.  i was sleeping on the 2nd floor of the house.   after a few minutes you could hear it move to other locations.  the only thing that i could think of was a ufo, and it was sitting there scanning us.  finally after 20 minutes the noise got very faint, and disappeared.   i was in shock after experiencing this.

either this was a miliatry craft that doesn't use fuel, or it's gotta be a ufo.

i have read up on mufon in the past, so i am a believer, but never thought this would happen to me.  i would of have gotten up to look out the window, but i was in shock and could not move.


also, as of 5/31/11 when i went to write this event.  i checked the live event map on the site mufon.Com and noticed a post that was from that same night and roughly the same location.  that event was about 50 miles away.
content.summary: Woke up to my son crying for a bottle.  the wife took care of that and i laid in bed.   i heard a weird sound fading in a out for 20 mins.

content.detailedDescription: I followed it 2mi in my car and took pictures.
content.shape: Circle,   Cross,   Fireball,   Flash,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Other
content.summary: Was awaken to go outside. saw the object. was like a huge colorful sparkler.

content.detailedDescription: I was going north on i45 around 1:30am cst may 29, 2011. i was in the right hand lane, there was an area of grass to my right then trees. to my left was the other traffic lane, a grass covered median, then the traffic lanes for southern bound traffic. traffic was very light, no vehicles very close to me. all of a sudden there was a very bright flashing light that seemed to be coming from above my car. i leaned forward and looked up and out the windshield. there was a small black circular object about 15 feet above my car, it had matched my speed (around 70 mph) and was flashing about once a second. there were no other lights, except the flashing one, and there was no noise. the object stayed just in front of, and above, my car for three or four minutes then slowed down and went to the truck behind me. i have checked the news in that area (north of huntsville, a few miles south of madisonville) but haven't seen any other reports of the sighting.
content.summary: Black circular object, flashing light, followed car

content.detailedDescription:
I am currently seeing a light which is round in shape moving on the clouds. the light is moving in the same circle for the last 30 mins. however is visible only on the clouds, when there is no clouds i see two shining points similar to a star, static.

there are two spot lights moving in two different elliptical radii one larger than the other. however both lights are criss-crossing in the elliptical.

i am unable to picture this as my camera is not able to take pics of the night sky !!
content.summary: Spot light on a cloud moving in elliptical form

content.detailedDescription:
Activity: surf fishing
date and time: 5/28/11 11:35 pm
location: lower eastern shore on the chesapeake bay
airfields nearby: naval air station patuxent river, salisbury-ocean city wicomico regional airport
weather: clear, starry night

i was fishing with my brother-in-law late saturday night. i looked up and saw a very large, bright, white, star-like object moving very slowly going northeast across the night sky. i stared at this object with extreme scrutiny and saw no blinking lights of any kind, just a steady bright white light. i observed it moving silently for about 30 seconds then it slowly, slowly faded away until my brother-in-law or myself could no longer see it, total time, around 2 minutes. it is hard for me to say what the altitude of this object could have been. there were planes flying around that night and this object didn't seem to be flying as high as those aircraft (commercial and local). the size of this star-like object was about the size of a penny (and just-a-bit smaller) if you held it up at arms length. i know this was no aircraft or meteor and i am fairly certain it wasn't the space station. i would like to know what it was because it was very interesting to observe.
content.summary: I saw a large, bright star-like object move slowly northeast at 11:35pm then it just faded away to nothing.

content.detailedDescription:
I admit i had been drinking.  my friends and i had been star gazing practically all night at the lake in rural missouri.  we saw several shooting stars and airplanes.  i stopped drinking from 2:00am - 4:00am so i could drive back home to st. louis.  i was sober at 4:00am.

at approximatley 4:00a.M., i walked to my car to leave, and i saw something bright out of the corner of my eye in the northern sky.  i looked up/over, and it was a huge (compared to airplanes, stars and planets) white light diamond shape moving rather fast, south to north.  i called my girlfriend to come see it, and she saw it too.  we were both freaked out.  and then it disappeared over the the next hill's treetops abrutly.

i tried to tell myself it was a satellite, but i looked up what they look like, typed in "diamond shaped light" and ufos popped up.

i thought it was moving in a straight line, but my friend said she thought it looked like it jumped, but that may have been due to her still having a beer in her hand at 4:00am, and it being behind a big tree and the branches may have been moving.

it scared me.
content.summary: Extremely bright diamond shaped light moving north

content.detailedDescription: Was outside taking out the trash and saw a tiny white "star" orb flying up. as i tracked it up there was a bigger "star" orb. it was just hovering there as 3 smaller orbs would fly in formation then split up do aerial acrobats. the larger orb would start dimming the glow very bright in a rhythmic way. almost seemed like the 3 smaller orbs would orbit around the big, kind of like a mother ship or something. they were all moving from the south west to the north east towards the san gabriel mountains. just didnt seem like anything man made, and the smaller orbs moving in uniform, doing 90 degree turns and almost appearing to stop on a dime. very fascinating.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Star like orbs, seen during the day

content.detailedDescription:
At 10:15 pm on may 21, 2011, i was outside sitting on my back deck. it was a clear and windless night. i noticed something out of the corner of my eye and looked up. what i saw was extraordinary. i had no idea what it was as i have never seen anything in my life like it. the ufo was heading exactly due norht at moderate speed(faster than a conventional aircraft). i watched the ufo for approximately 10 seconds until it went completly out of sight. i estimated the ufo was at an altitude of 20 to 50 thousand feet.
description:
the ufo had at least a dozen, solid, soft white lights that appeared to be placed evenly along the front in a slight boomerang shapped fashion. i could not exactally tell if the lights were attached to a solid body, or were seperate entities flying in a fixed formation. i want to say they were attached, however, if they were, the body of the object was black. the lights appeared to be spaced equally apart along the front of the object and were not blinking as with most conventional aircraft. i estimated the size of the ufo to be at least two hundred yards wide. it was a massive object, but very graceful. it made no sound as it moved across the sky almost directly overhead at about 80 degrees from my observation point. after the object passed out of sight, there was no sound trail. i was in total fasination of what i witnessed. i noted the time on my cell phone (10:15 p.M.)and thought about what to do next. after telling my wife about the object, i called the police aroud 10:20 p.M. i didn't know who else to call. i contacted the national ufo reporting center the following monday (5/23/11) and filled an official report with them. i was so amazed by the object, i wanted it to return. i have seen some strange (but explainable) things in my life, but this could not be explained. it was on a controled course and lasted around 10 secondes from the time i spotted it to the time it passed out of sight due north. i have attached a rough sketch as i had no time to get my camcorder.
content.summary: Boomerang or half-moon shaped object with constant white lights along the front traveling silently at a high spped across the sky in jackson, tn

content.detailedDescription: I was letting my two dogs out in the back yard , i lit a cigarette and noticed something moving in the sky.I focused in a translucent triangle with four dim  blue lights . i watched it fly from south to north.I was confused that it didn't  make a sound.I could see a vapor trail as i watched it fly off into the distance, it wasn't moving very fast and it wasn't flying very high.I'm always looking up at the night sky and i can see why no one else noticed the triangle, it was stealth.
content.summary: I saw a soundless translucent triangle with four blue lights fly over my neighborhood

content.detailedDescription:
As we turned into appelblaar street in glenmarias we noticed two bright orange lights moving along a flight path from ort ambo airport. one disappeared from view the other flew right in front of an aircraft taking off.  we gave chase driving along dann road but it was difficult to follow as we got held up at traffic lights and the object was obscured by the tree line.  the craft disappeared as if it landed.
w
e then drove back along dann rd to woodbridge square. from the fnb bank we watched the second orange orb float silently overhead. we stood and looked right up into the craft.  it was very exciting and was torn between taking my eye of the craft and setting up the video on my cell phone.  in the end i managed to get two photos as it disappeared behind woolworths. as it flew over the building it dimmed a bit and then it lit up again.
this was a true case of a unidentified flying object as neither of us had seen anything like it before or imagined a ���flying saucer��� to look like this.  it looked a bit like a big orange ball of gaseous jellyfish.

on reading another sighting in park rynie natal the lady describes it well: ���it was huge and looked like a hot air balloon without a basket for passengers moving across the sky.  it was all lit up from the inside, like a huge candle in a huge balloon.���
content.summary: Two bright orange lights moving along a flight path from ortambo airport. one dissapeared from view the other flew right in front of an aircraft taking off

content.detailedDescription:
[link moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg]

more ufos from this night.  i have observed them manipulating weather. this should be obvious to the astute observer.  i have no reason to believe they are alien in nature, but appear to be spiritual in origin and makeup. you will notice they go from orb or fireball, to what appears to be a blinking aircraft.  they are very numerous and can be seen directly above my home on any clear night.  they have been a bit troublesome to have around, and occasionally come too close to comfort, but make for good video.  thank you,                                                           ufozmankato
content.summary: [link moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg]

content.detailedDescription: Walked outside to have a cigarette bout 12:45am sat on steps gazing up staring at the stars, then seen what i thought at first was plane or a helicopter but this wasnt blinking the green or red lights like most planes i see (being that airport only 5-7 miles away from where i am living)this looked like a star moving across the sky, thought to myself if it was space station. the direction this travel was from northwest toward the southeast. watched it travel from one bunch of stars to another , stopped for bout 15 seconds or so at the second bunch of stars and then started moving backwards toward where it started. right before it got to the point where i seen it start the light went poof and disappeared. finished my cigarette waiting to see if it appear back again but never did
content.summary: A star moved from point

content.detailedDescription: I was outside by the pool and this shiney metallic object heading east in the sky. it was at a pretty good altitude and it was hauling. i ran in the breezeway and yelled to my girl to grab the camera. by the time i got back outside to photograph the object. i have the pic, it's not the best but when photographed it appeared whitish and not metallic i'm not saying it was a ufo for sure but i'm 39 years old and have never seen anything like it. just want to reporte it because it was strange and i'm a beleiver and just feel in my gut it was something that was not of this planet. there was no contrail at all !! very odd folks, very odd. for whatever reason your sites not allowing me to post a picture but i do have one.
content.summary: Noticed a cigar shaped metallic object with no contrail and moving very very fast

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting outside on my friends porch in the north end in boise, id at about 4:30 pm. i noticed a small black dot (which i discarded as a balloon at the time)floating in the sky. after tracking it for about one minute. the object then stopped and went the opposite direction and something resembling wings extended from the sides. at this point i was a little shocked and lost track of the object as it flew overhead. there were no planes around when i was outside.

later i was in my car smoking a cigarette a few blocks from where i noticed the object. i saw a man in a black suit, black fedora hat, glasses and ear peace walk past. i also noticed he happened to be carrying what looked unmistakeably like a holster to a pistol under his coat. i noticed this man pass me three times in the course of twenty minutes as if he was patrolling the area. i also saw a black car with no license plates driven by a similarly dressed man and a yet similarly dressed passenger.
content.summary: Odd moving black object, strange uniformed men.

content.detailedDescription: I was enjoying the peak of the 2010 harvest moon in my backyard.  while laying on my back looking at the orion constellation a circular object lit up then flew away around 3:30 a.M.  the circle was 200 yards above my head and went unnoticed until the outer rim lit up a brilliant blue turning white and flew off.  scientifically speaking the area that lit up made it look like a doughnut.  the flight pattern was in an upside down 7.  it moved to the side then shot off in a long streak which appeared to be upwards though i cannot be sure.  the event transpired within a few seconds.  i've lived in many different places with many changes in latitude and longitude but have never seen any ufo activity except for toombs county.  there have been many similar events here always happening at night.  i have lost count of how many such events personally experienced in this area.  these experiences have never surprised me probably because of growing up on star wars, etc.  all i know is the experience brings awe at the speed in which i have seen these things move.  there is nothing i personally know of that can move that fast.  i've seen the blackbirds and stealth bomber airplanes flight speed and those pale in comparison with the ufos.  the topography of toombs county is very unique while sitting on a hot spot.  the atmospheric pressure is generally very high here.
content.summary: 2010 harvest moon ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was observing what appeared to be a jet at high altitude, approx 30-35,000 ft. with a very clear and noticable trail being emitted. i wasnt able to see the plane so i zoomed in as best i could and was able to get this one picture. after examineing it i decided to submit it to your organization. i was taking a break from mowing when i noticed it. i have other photos a few hours later of the sky that evening. probably moot but it did rain for several hours on sunday may 30th.
content.summary: Photo of unknown object releasing chemtrails

content.detailedDescription: First i just wanted to point out that i am almost 40 years old and up until this point i have never seen anything in the sky i could not explain.  i am an educated professional and have never really taken the ufo phenomenon very seriously.  however, i have witnessed two things in less than a week i cannot explain which were extarordinary. i observed a enourmous silent triangle glide over my house on 5/26/11.  it defied belief, even as i was watching it with my own eyes. i have no explination as to what it was.  i told a few close friends about the incident and made a mufon report.  i considered the isssue over and put it to rest.  then on 5/30/11 at around 0415 hours my dog was scratching at the door to go out for a bathroom break.  i walked out to the front steps to wait while my dog did his business.  i looked up and observed a beautiful clear sky. i remember kinda thinking to myself that this was about the same time i had observed the unexplained triangle but figured my sighting was a once in a lifetime experience. it was rather chilly out so i went back inside and put on sweatshirt and returned outside.  when i stopped on the top step i looked to the south and observed what appeared to be a long green streak of light coming out of two very distinct white lights at the top of the shaft of green light. the lights were near the front gate of the property aproximately one hundred yards away. the first white light was very large(much larger than a star, about the size of a basket ball) followed by a second smaller light.  the two lights appeared to be moving very slowly a few thousand feet above the ground to the northeast. the two lights were aligned one behind the other in relation to its direction of travel.  between the two lights was a greenish haze which that appeared to arc outwards between the two lights.  the greenish haze not only formed between the lights but seemed to somehow seemed to come together under the lights and pointed towards the ground like a spotlight.  the greenish light did not hit the ground and appeared to be about halfway to the ground from the lights altitude.  the greenish spotlight was what drew my attention to the lights to begin with.  it was an unbelievable sight. i was half expecting to see the triangle again but i could not make out a size or shape but it appeared as though the two lights were connected.  the entire thing moved silently across the road and was moving slowly towards the northeast. i did not hear a thing. i ran to my driveway and tried to snap a photo with my cell phone. i took two photos but i can see nothing in the photos.  i remembered i had a pair of binoculars just inside the house so i ran in and retrieved them hoping the object would still be visible.  when i got back outside a few seconds later, i could still see the object gliding to the northeast.  i used the binoculars but could not make out any features.  i could just see the two white lights and green shaft of light. the entire thing appeared to just fly away until it disappeared from sight near the mountains.  i observed the object for several minutes.  it did not change in appearance or have any blinking or colored lights.  my preception was the object was much smaller, slower, and lower in altitude than the huge triangle i saw several nights previous.  i would love to know what i have been seeing.  i am not crazy and have always considered myself a rational person not prone to jumping to conclusions.  i just wanted to report what i observed.  i do not know what it was nor can i speculate as to what it was.
content.summary: Two white lights (one much larger than the other) with a lighted green haze around them and coming out of the bottom like a spotlight

content.detailedDescription: I was walking to the near by burger king like always i look to the sky to see what if any thing is moveing i am an amature astonomer and often look for sattalites and ufo's this is my fourth or fifth sighting o k back to what i saw i was looking around and spotted what i thought was a balloon riseing from the near by school toward the west it was twilight and i could see the out line black round ball this caught my attention still thinking it was a ballon i kept looking at it,it  seemed to reach about 200 feet high then it started to move in my direction from the west to the east still watching, it gained speed and came toward me still at 200 feet this was coming almost directly in my direction as it flew almost right overhead all i could see a round black ball but i did see a very slight white light outline  on the upper part kind of like a crescent moon but there where no lights for a reflection from above it went out of my sight for a second or two as the building blocked my view i ran around the corner to see where it should be but is was gone  my guess it was travling at about 80 to 100 mph,size wise it seemed to a bigger than a basket ball 24 to 30 inches ,  i hope this helps
content.summary: A black ball ascended then went lateral almost directly overhead

content.detailedDescription: First, i want to say that i spent my entire childhood in alaska and know very well what fog refraction, aurora borealis lights (which brighten the sky during the night), red moon, red tides, midnight stars and a dozen other night lights in the sky, but this was very different.  it was shortly past midnight, when the living room's glass door seemed to have a spot light shining on it.  the light was so bright that it was shining off my ceiling and onto the kitchen cabinets (no small feat).  i noticed all three animals i own were acting very strange, our dog was hovering on the couch, growling very low like he was afraid to actually growl or bark as he would normally if anything was outside.  our cat huddled on the floor behind my husband's shoes, so just his nose and ears were above the rim of the sneakers.  he flattened his ears and was staring at the door that he is normally staring out or trying to sneak out (earlier i had let the dog out for his nightly routine and there was nothing strange about the night and our cat tried as usual to sneak out on me).  i called him several times before he literally jumped into the air and spun around to stare at me with huge eyes.  we also have a dwarf rabbit who was frantically clawing at the bottom of her cage, as if trying to bury herself.  the light seemed very steady and bright, so i walked over to look outside.  the night sky was lit up like it was daytime, except the clouds (there was broken cloud cover last night, but the moon was in its' waning crescent phase) had the shadows of the building near us and the trees around us, but there was absolutely no fog last night.  it was as if there was a giant beam of light in the southern sky that was being refracted off the ground and causing everything to shadow on the atmosphear in the northern sky.  i know this because i actually opened the doors and walked out onto the patio.  i was standing there looking around me wondering what in the world was going on, when i noticed that the entire night was void of any sounds, no animals or insects like would be normal for this time of year, no helicopters or planes landing, not even any cars going past...Nothing, but silence.  now, i'm normally not frightened by the night time.  in fact, i love the nights here in oregon, but this time i felt a choking sensation, became sick to my stomach and a little dizzy, it reminded me of being in line behind a car with very bad exhaust and being choked, sickened and dizzy, except there was absolutely no odor in the air.  so i returned to my seat on the couch.  after which, i noticed the television signal (we have directv) kept breaking up until i just turned it off, then i noticed that the vcr lights went brighter and dimmer.  the light outside went from normal white type light to a yellow haze, then to an orange color.  i watched the light for somewhere between 25 and 55 minutes (i'm not certain because although i recall looking at the vcr clock when it all began, i can't recall what time it was).  although i returned to the couch, i kept a steady eye on the light outside coming from nowhere.  i felt a strange tightness rising in my chest and my heart was beating heavily.  i grew up with fog, night lights that are organic and man made, but this was like nothing i've ever seen!  i can't seem to recall the exact time it began, although i do recall looking at the clock on our vcr, but the next time i looked it was 12:49 a.M., by 12:58 it was gone, just like that it disappeared leaving the normal night time darkness.  i am not one to loose my cool and get shook up over very much, because growing up in ak, i saw some very odd stuff, red moons, red tides, lights reflected off of heavy fog that looked doubley bright, but this was like nothing else i've ever seen and i'm no spring chicken either.  i've been chased by bears, even had a shark swim between my legs after a salmon one summer and never was as scared as i was last night.  and just in case there are those who may want to believe i was asleep and some how dreaming this, you can forget it because i didn't fall asleep until morning broke at 5:20 a.M. and i felt certain the thing was gone. i'm wondering if anyone else out there saw the night sky and the strange bright lights.
content.summary: Lit up night sky so much the buildings and trees had shadows on the clouds

content.detailedDescription:
[name removed/cms/tg] of oregon mufon suggested i report this.

we were at the oregon gardens spending time with family. i love taking black and white pictures with my iphone camera using the hipstamatic app. there is a waiting stop for the shuttle at the top of the hill where the oregon garden resort is. on top of that stop there is a weather vane. at that time of day and the way the clouds were and the amount of light that there was i had a great shot, so i took it with my camera. a few days later after i posted the picture to facebook one of my friends made a comment about the strange object in the upper left hand corner of the picture. since i didn't know about the object at the time i took the picture i can't describe how long it was there or its actions.
content.summary: Unknown object in black an white image

content.detailedDescription:
To describe the conditions this morning, it was a clear sky, i.E. no clouds in the sky (just the blue sky). weather conditions were, 28-29 degree centigrade, no wind or dust in the atmosphere and low humidity conditions. it was bright as the sun was up already, hence no chances of any mistakes.

i am an indian national living with my wife in sharjah (united arab emirates). every morning i drive my wife to work, since the last five years. we take the same route every day, which is a very short one, on the path of which i can recognize all the structures. 

this morning, i.E. 6:50 am (30th may 2011), i was driving my wife to work, when i stopped at a big round-about to go left. i was looking towards my left hand side where i was checking for passing by vehicles, when my eyes met this really shiny object just hovering at an approximate height of 300-350 ft. this object was simply hovering without any noise or movement. it was really shiny, the texture which could be best described like that of stainless steel surface (because of the factor as to how the sun light was bouncing off of it). it just hung there, when my wife also saw it. the object was a typical disc shaped, saucer like ufo. i could tell it was a disc-shaped object as it just on its side just for a bit revealing the shape. i witnessed it for nearly 20 seconds, with me and my wife sitting in my car at the round-about just staring at it when it simply just disintegrated into thin air, it just vanished right in front of our eyes. earlier i have always noticed certain huge round shaped shadows being casted ton the ground, just to look up and see nothing. also, other phenomenon like strange sky scars that cannot be formed by any airplane. it was very phenomenal for us to witness a ufo for the first time in our lives. unfortunately, since i was in my car with the engine on, i could not get a chance to grab a picture of it, also because i was dumb-struck just looking at it.

it was no weather phenomenon, no visual trick, no planet, no blimp, no swamp gas, nothing else but a ufo.
content.summary: Stainless steel shine disc-shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription: Two of my friends were sleeping at a freinds house in his back garden inside his sisters small wooden house.It was between 5 and 6 in the morning and the weather was clear,little cloud and no sunshine nor rain.We were all asleep when i heard a rumbling noise and the ground was shakeing,the noise was comeing from the sky and was getting closer.We all rushed outside and looked into the sky and it took only a second or two to c where and what the noise was.I looked up and sore a cigar shaped u.F.O.It was chrome and had no windows and no wings,it was just motionless and no noise watsoever.It was approx 50ft from the ground and approx 60 to 70ft in diameter.We all staired at it for about 15 seconds when i for some reason decided to run down the garden,down the steps through the gate,down the drive abit,jumped over the drive gates onto the main road.I looked up and it had gone without no noise,i didnt c it go nor were there any cars or people.I still carnt understand y i ran to the road because were i was was a perfect view point and from the road the view wouldnt of been so good.I whent back to the rear garden to where my friends was.My mind was from there on,i carnt remember what we talked about or anything.I can remember some time later keep asking just one of my friends about it but he never talked about it,he never rejected it or denied seeing just changed the subdject.Some years later i was parralised in bed,i couldnt move any part of my body apart from my one of my feet,its never happend since.
content.summary: 3 of my freinds sore a cigar shaped ufo in daylight 50ft above our heads,it was stood stil,motionless.
